### Police Department

LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCY  
500 Cenizo Dr., Sullivan City, TX,   
United States, Texas  
  
Phone: (956) 485-9208

### Fire Department

FIRE PROTECTION SERVICE  
500 Cenizo Dr., Sullivan City, TX,   
United States, Texas  
  
Phone: (956) 485-9208

### Sullivan Library - Opening Hours

**Monday-Thursday: 3:00 PM to 7:00 PM**

FRIDAY: Closed

**Saturday : 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM**

SUNDAY: Closed

**Phone: (956) 485-9208**
